entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 2:00 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 6.6°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 11.
